attributes.action: make cyclists take out a minimum of third-party insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cyclist DO cause accidents, even though most of them deny this. If other road useres have to have insurance, why not cyclists? Why should motorists always have to bear the brunt of claiming & losing their no claims bonuses when someone else is at fault? Or have to pay out of their own pockets for damages caused by cyclists?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
